Assassins.description:
(2) Assassins gain +15% @Crit chance 
 (4) On @Crit apply @Poison 
 (6) @Poison tick applies @Vulnerability

Archers.description:
(3) @Scathe: 30% to @Bonus Shot 
 (6) @Bonus Shot 15% to trigger another @Bonus Shot

PlagueSpreaders.description:
(2) @Plague heals allies for 0.5 after dealing damage to them 
 (4) @Skeletons gain @Scathe: apply @Plague 
 (6) @Skeletons gain +100% @base_damage, @move_speed and @max_hp

Warlocks.description:
(2) @Scathe: apply @Siphon Life if target doesnâ€™t have it 
 (4) @Siphon Life damage has 15% chance to @Stun 
 (6) @Siphon Life damage is AoE

Freezers.description:
(2) @Frozen enemies have @Vulnerability 
 (4) @Injured: apply @Frozen to enemies in small area 
 (6) On @Frozen apply @Stun for 3 sec.

Dragons.description:
(1) All Dragons have @Flaming Breath attack 
 (2) All Dragons gain @Rebirth (4) @Flaming Breath always applies @Burn (6) @Burn damage applies @Vulnerability

Protectors.description:
(2) On attack 25% chance to gain @Shield 
 (4) On @Injured 25% chance to gain @Shield (6) @Shield has 2 charges

Vampires.description:
(2) +20% @Vampirism to all allies 
 (4) @Vampirism can heal 40% past @max_hp 
 (6) +3 @max_hp on kill

Demons.description:
(1) All @Demons @Dark Steal on Melee or Ranged @Scathe 
 (2) @Dark Steal applies @Vulnerability 
 (4) @Demons gain +40 @action_speed 
 (6) @Dark Steal heals for sum of stolen stats
